name: BARBOUNIA
address: 250 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10003, USA

reviews.text: Booked a table and arrived on time with  my friends . After a 45 mins wait and many apologies we walked out and went across the street . We were glad we did , this restaurant was so loud inside we were happy to leave anyway.

We had a reservation for 7:30 for 3 people, they made us wait 45 minutes! After 44 minutes we spoke to the front desk lady, she said your table will be ready soon, i told her that i won t wait another minute then i left.
This being said, i m happy because it was SO noisy!! Lol
I went to the express just in front of them, mch more quieterüòä
Every time I visit this area I go to this place.  Almost 3 time in a row.

Really enjoyed my visit to Barbounia! The ambiance was great, lively, but still comfortable. I got there a bit early and sat at the bar while waiting for the rest of my party. Even though I didn‚Äôt stay long, the bartender (didn‚Äôt catch his name) was super attentive and friendly, which started the night off right.

We didn‚Äôt realize our reservation landed during the switch between lunch and dinner service, so we had to wait until 5 p.m. to order from the dinner menu. It would‚Äôve been nice to know that when booking, but not a huge deal.

Once seated, a waiter (who we actually never saw again) took our mezze order. We got the spicy feta, fire-roasted eggplant, pickles & olives, and taboon flatbread and WOW, every single one was amazing. Super flavorful and fresh. Couldn‚Äôt even pick a favorite!

We also ordered the grilled Portuguese octopus, which was perfectly cooked, tender, soft, and easy to cut. Didn‚Äôt even need a knife.

For mains, we went with the lamb kofta kebab terracotta and the slow-cooked short ribs. The kofta was okay but nothing special (maybe a bit overhyped on social media). The short ribs, though, were simply incredible rich, beefy, and tender. My only complaint is that they were a bit too salty, and the couscous on the side was pretty dry.

Overall, really nice experience. The vibe was great. I‚Äôd definitely come back, maybe next time just for drinks and mezze at the bar!

Great brunch experience with my wife place has great food from the flat bread with the hummus and spicy feta spread to the crab meat Benedict. My wife enjoy the brunch especial lobster omelette. Service was knowledgeable and attentive without been aggressive. The only down part for me is they the tables are too close to each others. Evin  was a great server thank you so much
Food was really delicious, upscale Mediterranean, service was top notch. The negative was that the restaurant tables are so close together and it was very loud.

Our service was non-existent. The waiter met us once to collect our order- other employees brought our food, and we waited 20 minutes for dessert/the check before we had to walk to the host stand to ask for attention. The food was satisfactory for the price. Genuine shame. So much potential.

Came around 4pm. My GF, I and baby. Baby was sleeping. Hostess explained they had some apps and drinks available which is exactly what we wanted. They sat us- no one greeted us at table. No water. No request of drinks. About 5-10 min in we were asked to move tables. We had no issue. Couldn‚Äôt actually move the sleeping baby because one of the waiters was restocking napkins. Didn‚Äôt realize. No problem. When finally moved tables. We waited there as everyone ignored us. Place was mostly empty. We got up and left. I said look we will back another time. The manager came out to talk To me. I tried to explain why I felt the service was absolutely unacceptable. He got nasty with me. Frankly this place has mediocre food and overpriced drinks. Don‚Äôt waste your money. Isabelles across the street is Better and service excellent.
Flavors that linger long after you leave.

The place is nice and the atmosphere is kind of cool, however is super packed at night. The tables are pretty close to each others. I was sitting at a place where all the waitresses were passing constantly and that was a little annoying. Food quality was ok.
Super decent spot for a date, business lunch, or drinks. Nice attentive staff, good upscale interior, quality food with a variety of options for most dietary restrictions.
good vibe
bartender at the bar G was so friendly and helpful !
The Bar area worked as the restaurant was very busy and George was amazing serving us!!
Jorge, Eugenio and Erik are the best and made the evening super special!  Top notch evening and thank you again for having us!
Gene at the bar was 10/10
Eugene took great care of us
Gonzalo was fantastic. 10/10 service!!! Thank you so much! Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

this was our first time at barbounia ‚Äî we had just landed in new york and decided to come straight here for dinner. the food was incredible, and our waiter gonzalo made the experience even better ‚Äî super attentive, friendly, and on point with everything. definitely recommend asking for him if you come!
Incredible dinner and amazing service by Gonzalo!!
The food was very good. The service was better. Great vibe very energetic. We will definitely be back.

Excellent, consistently so. The cuisine is diverse and tasty, the drinks creative and tasty and the venue conducive and enjoyable. Yes, it can get a touch loud at peak times and, yes, the tables are a touch too close together, but these are mere quibbles: perhaps these knock this down from an A+ to an A, but it's a solid, delicious A. Go. Treat yourself. You deserve it.
Gonzalez was excellent. Friendly and helpful!
◊û◊ì◊î◊ô◊ù

Gonzalo C was our server for the night, he was very kind and informative! Especially because we had a birthday for my twins. His energy was very positive and it made us feel comfortable in the restaurant.
Perfect service!
Eugene is one of my favorite bartenders in the city! Super personable, funny, and amazing service.  10/10 recommend.
Service immaculate, Eugene did a great job! Basilika one of my favorites in the city, a must try!
Absolutely outstanding! The dips were all phenomenal. The drinks were delicious and service was top notch. We will definitely be back!
Gonzalo was fantastic! Great server and delicious food. Really enjoyed the atmosphere of the restaurant and did a great job accommodating our big party.
Gonzalo was the best server!   We'll be back
Such a fabulous dinner. First time at Barbounia and I'll definitely be back. Especially for the Lamb Terracotta!! Thanks Gonazlo üòÅ
Beautiful atmosphere and delicious food

Cozy Mediterranean spot with plenty of shareable options that compliment the lively atmosphere for a great dinner option. The lamb is the star of the show and the ratings would be much higher if the meat portions were more. $40 a dish. 4.25/5 stars as a dinner spot.
Great service from Gonzalo
Came for my anniversary. Our waiter, Gonzalo, took great care of us even when I spilled champagne all over the table on accident. The food‚Äôs middle eastern staples done really well.
Amazing experience!! 10/10 food and service. Gonzalo was super kind!
wow that was special. bread, fluffy. chicken, delicious. hummus, creamy. vibes, immaculate. this place is no joke. best mediterranean in town no doubt. shout out shatzy, man.
Gonzalo is the man
Gonzalo was the best server ever
Gonzalo C had wonderful service with great convo!
Fantastic and friendly and informative service with a smile. Made our girls night so much fun!
Gene was a phenomenal server for the eve, made my wife and I feel right at home!
Came here for an impromptu‚Äô dinner.  Santiago was our server and was super knowledgeable.  Eugene had excellent recommendations for us at the bar.  Great night overall!
Always a great time at Barbounia! Love the food and Santiago our waiter was so attentive and accommodating. If you sit at the bar, say hi to Eugene the bartender, handsome and cool üòé
Eugenio is the man! Great service
Amazinggggg all around‚Ä¶ the atmosphere, the food, and the cocktails by Eugene were so on point!
Lovely drinks at the bar with a friend
Eugene made an amazing set of drinks! Delicous Manhattans and Old Fashiioneds
G the Barman was amazing, paired every dish with the correct drink
Îü∞ÏπòÌîΩÏä§Î©îÎâ¥ ÌõåÎ•≠Ìï¥Ïöî. ÏßÄÏ§ëÌï¥ÏãùÎ©îÎâ¥Ï¢ãÍ≥† 6Í∞ÄÏßÄ Í∞ÄÎãàÏâ¨ÏôÄ Î∏åÎ†àÎìúÍ∞Ä ÎÑò Ï¢ãÏïòÏñ¥Ïöî. Îã® ÏπòÌÇ®ÌîºÌÉÄÎäî Í∑∏ÎÉ•Í∑∏Îû¨ÏäµÎãàÎãπ~

Restaurant had a Mediterranean feel with plenty of light and a delightful breeze flowing through multiple large double doors. Food is delicious. Israeli salad was fresh and invigorating. Chicken schnitzel sandwich was large and difficult to eat but tasted great. Would highly recommend. Reasonable prices and friendly staff.

We had a fantastic evening at Barbounia. The place is vibrant, full of energy, and definitely on the lively side, so expect a fun atmosphere rather than a quiet dinner.

Our waiter, Timur, made the night special. He was attentive, professional, and handled all of our allergy restrictions with real care. Every dish came out perfect, and you could tell he takes pride in what he does. If you can, try to sit in his section.

Food highlights:
‚Ä¢	The red snapper was cooked perfectly, juicy and flavorful.
‚Ä¢	The short rib was slow cooked and melted in the mouth, one of the best I‚Äôve had in a while.
‚Ä¢	For dessert, the tahini ice cream halva dish stood out. It had a unique texture and layered flavors that I‚Äôd highly recommend.

The only miss for us was the Greek salad, which was heavy on dill and vinegar, throwing off the balance. Everything else was superb.

Service, food, and ambiance all get top marks from me. The restaurant does get busy, so reservations are a good idea. If you‚Äôre looking for a place with great Mediterranean food, excellent service, and a buzzing scene, Barbounia is a solid choice

Food was amazing, the atmosphere was cozy. Everything we ordered was delightful. We both ended up going over our limits because our appetites were just soaring. 10/10, and will be back for the rest of the menu (hopefully).

I visited this restaurant based on its 4.6 rating and great location near the movie theater. The service was excellent, and the atmosphere was stylish and inviting.
However, the food was disappointing. It looked great on the plate, but it was surprisingly tasteless. As someone who enjoys gourmet food, taste matters a lot to me and this missed the mark completely. I spent over $100 and left unsatisfied. Also, the plates and dishware felt outdated for a restaurant of this level.
If you're going just for the ambiance and good service, you might enjoy it. But if delicious food is your priority, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. I won‚Äôt be returning.
Excellent food/drink, service, and atmosphere. Love the moorish inspired arches. My hotel recommended this restaurant when I was on a business trip and they were spot on. The food tastes so fresh.

Had a really good brunch here the other weekend with two friends. We shared the French toast, which was absolutely out of this world. It was so good. We then ordered the pancakes, which were good, but did not compare to the French toast. The other brunch items were all really good, I would highly recommend this place for brunch. You can‚Äôt go wrong.

Had the branzino of my dreams and a phenomenal hummus. You can really taste that they make the hummus in house; it's incredibly fresh and well seasoned. Gonzalo was our waiter and did an excellent job! All our food came out quick and he was super kind! Will be coming back

We had such an incredible experience dining here! From start to finish, Gonzalo and all the service was exceptional. The staff was so warm, attentive, and unbelievably accommodating to us and our baby, which made the whole night so much easier and more enjoyable.

The food itself was outstanding we were guided toward the best menu choices, and everything we ordered was spot on. The flavors, presentation, and quality were all top notch.

This was our first time here. Came to celebrate my wife‚Äôs birthday. Excellent place!  The food was so delicious. We had the beef barley soup, the crab cakes and the eggplant dish with salsas verde as appetizers. The eggplant was savory and not bitter. It paired well with the salsa verde. The crab cakes were excellent and a different tasty taste from the usual crab cakes. We had the salmon, halibut,  and chicken kabob. The salmon was moist; the halibut was wonderful and the chicken kabob was juicy and exquisite. The chocolate and pineapple desserts were wonderful. The hostess, Estefania, was pleasant and accommodating. Our waiter, Nick,  was amazing. He seemed to know the entire menu, lol, describing the ingredients and taste of the plates we asked about. He was on point with all his recommendations. He was also patient and attentive.
The noise level was at a  typical  ew York high level but we were able to hear and speak at a normal level. We definitely be back!

Always a great time at Barbunia. Love this place, and the food and drinks never disappoint. Great wine selection and great atmosphere. Had their picanha steak special, and it was AMAZING!. Desserts were really tasty and enjoyable. Service was outstanding and attentive
EDDIE is the man, best waiter ever. If I could give six out of five stars for service I would. LOVE THIS RESTAURANT. Such strong and yummy drinks, food is a 10/10.

Very good food, good service, a great way to spend dinner ahead of attending an event at the Gramercy Theater. I was so looking forward to having the rose water panna cotta & it definitely lived up to the hype!

Edit to add: I wish restaurants (not just this one) would stop calling button mushrooms "wild mushrooms" on the menu.

This was the best meal of our entire trip to NYC! We come to the city at least 2-3 times a year and this was our first time at Barbounia‚Ä¶ it will not be our last! The food was delicious, the service was awesome and the atmosphere was outstanding!!! 10/10 recommend!!

I arrived with no reservation and sat at the bar with a friend quickly. Our bartender Eugene D. Was attentive and quick with service. Food was flavorful with large portions perfect to share. Highlights are the spicy feta with bread, the grilled octopus, and the lamb terracotta are all 10/10! Los lighting and music. Perfect for dates with friends or other.

Had a great time celebrating with my best-friends at Barbounia! The food was really good, everything we ordered was flavorful and well-prepared. The staff was also super nice and helpful. Would definitely recommend coming here for a special occasion or just a nice meal out.

Barbounia was already on my list but Eugene made the whole experience unforgettable. Easily the best bartender I have had in New York. He was funny attentive and honestly felt a little psychic. He asked all the right questions and somehow just knew what I would like. Every recommendation was spot on and a total surprise in the best way.

I left so full I had to sit on a bench outside to regroup. He kept the drinks flowing and the food coming. The octopus was insane. The cocktail he picked for me tasted like vacation. I did not even know what I was craving until he handed it to me.

Eugene if you see this you are a legend. Everyone else go sit at the bar. Let him run the show.

Gene and Bryan were incredible. They were very knowledgeable and helpful with the high end bourbon available at this restaurant. I was able to try bourbon that I had been keeping an eye out for for several months. Who would have known I'd find it at this place? Hidden gem for sure.

Barbounia Restaurant ‚Äì A Culinary Masterpiece on Park Avenue!

It‚Äôs hard to put into words how extraordinary our dining experience was at Barbounia in Manhattan. Simply put‚Äîthis place üè† is a must!

Touted as ‚ÄúA Mediterranean Affair,‚Äù that phrase barely scratches the surface of what awaits you. This is a one-of-a-kind dining journey through the Middle East, Lebanon, Morocco, Israel, and beyond‚Äîa vibrant explosion üí• of flavors unlike anything you‚Äôve tasted üòõ.

From the first bite, your tastebuds üëÖ are introduced to a harmony of exotic herbs and spices.

Having little experience identifying these aromatic and tasty blends, I won‚Äôt even attempt to give a written description of what my palate was privy too.

Chef Mor is a true culinary artist, with the rare talent to imagine flavors in his mind and bring them to life on your plate. Watching him meticulously inspect every dish before it left the kitchen was impressive. His constant dialogue with the floor manager showed his commitment to perfection in every detail.

We felt compelled to meet him and thank him personally‚Äîthis was no ordinary meal, it was a crafted experience.

Our server, Grigo, was the perfect guide through the menu, leading us to unforgettable dishes that can only be described as OMG! Barbounia was buzzing inside and out‚Äîlively and energetic‚Äîbut the ambiance, expertly made cocktails, and seamless service created an atmosphere of effortless sophistication.

The decor? Stunning. High ceilings, arched aisles, glowing globe lights‚Äîall set the tone. But let‚Äôs talk chairs ü™ë. Cushioned, curved, and perfectly weighted, they were the most comfortable restaurant chairs I‚Äôve ever sat in. Dining here felt like being cradled in luxury.

Now the food‚Ä¶ ü•ò

Starters
We had the hummus, Israeli salad ü•ó, and grilled octopus üêô.
‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†The hummus‚Äîsilky, creamy, blended with tahini‚Äîsurrounded a pool üèä of crushed tomatoes üçÖ, cilantro üåø, olive oil ü´í, and chickpeas. Dipping the warm bread ü•ñ into it was divine. A true slice of heaven. .
‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†The octopus üêô? So tender, paired perfectly with marinated chickpeas, chillies üå∂Ô∏è, oregano üåø, red onion üßÖ, olives ü´í, and labaneh.  A great pairing of flavors.
‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†The Israeli chopped salad ü•ó was crisp, refreshing, and coated in a creamy, tangy tahini dressing, with mint, cucumbers ü•í, and crispy pita ü•ô.
These were the perfect start.

Main Courses
Every dish was an explosion üí• of flavor.

‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†The Short Rib Tagine ü•© was deeply aromatic‚Äîbraised with Swiss chard ü•¨, harissa, preserved lemon üçã, and homemade couscous üçö.

.  It was a stew üç≤ that was so aromatic üëÉ that we knew the taste would be unbelievable, which it was.

‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†The Roasted Chicken Shish Kebab üêì came with braised freekeh, peas ü´õ, almonds ü•ú, sumac, and the standout: a green pea tahini dip so good we all dunked our bread ü•ñ in it. The peas literally burst üí• in your mouth!  Extraordinary.

‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†I had the Long Island Duck Shawarma ü¶Ü‚Äîserved on forbidden black rice üçö with mushrooms üçÑ, amba, tahini, pine nuts üå∞ & sumac. Rich, bold, and plated üçΩÔ∏è to perfection‚Äîa true masterpiece.

Desserts
‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†A decadent red velvet and chocolate mousse with strawberries üçì and rose petals üåπ, dusted with a magical strawberry üçì powder.

‚Ä¢¬†¬†¬†And the star: a tangy fruit delight crowned with cloud-like ‚òÅÔ∏è halavah cotton candy ü™∂ that melted in your mouth üòõ. Beyond amazing!

Yes, this review is long‚Äîbut deservedly so. Barbounia isn‚Äôt just a meal‚Äîit‚Äôs an unforgettable experience from start to finish.

My Final two words: ‚ÄúJust Go!‚Äù

Beautiful ambiance, delicious food, excellent service! The restaurant is actually more pretty in person than in pictures. Anna was a wonderful waitress, the staff couldn‚Äôt have been any more attentive!
First time here and I‚Äôm definitely coming back. Radko the bartender was amazing, very attentive and friendly. I highly recommend this place.

10/10 experience! We got seated quickly,  very attentive servers, food arrived fast, everything was delicious and our server was knowledgeable about gluten free options! We split the octopus, I had the duck shwarama, my husband had the lamb, and we shared the Silan dessert which was so tasty and unique!

Cherry on top was the fact that when my husband made the reservation he included that the occasion was my birthday-but didn‚Äôt mention it at the restaurant or any other time - and when the dessert came out they had lit a candle in it and sang me happy birthday! Such a nice surprise and so thoughtful. Great attention to detail.

Will definitely recommend/ be back!

Amazing food and service always! I have came here for 7 years now and it's been consistent, amazing, and such a lively great vibe! Eugene at the bar today was amazing, fast and friendly service!
Hummus and cauliflower are a must!
Amazing experience, we had many common Mediterranean dishes, and they were all beautifully presented and with a twist.
Gonzalo is a great waiter! I enjoyed our meal in a barbounia will def come back!!!

I came here last weekend with a big group of girls for my dear friend's birthday brunch, and we all had a wonderful time. Gonzalo C. was the server who took care of us and he was truly fabulous. He took the time to help each of us with the drink and food menu, helping us select drinks and dishes that would work best for our flavor preferences. He was also consistently attentive throughout our long meal, checking in to make sure we had everything we needed. It was a lovely experience!
Eugenio & Nick at the bar were amazing!!! Recommended custom margarita with Milagro Cristalino which was very tasty and food that came out quick as I was limited with time. Will definitely be back!

Friends, it‚Äôs time to spread the word and let you in on a little secret‚Ä¶
This is hands down my favorite spot in Manhattan.
Almost every visit to the city starts and ends here ‚Äî Barbounia.

Walking into this place feels like stepping into a palace.
The way they treat you? Let‚Äôs just say you might as well be royalty or a head of state.
The cleanliness is always impeccable, and the food‚Ä¶ well, that‚Äôs why we‚Äôre all here, right?

Every time, it‚Äôs a new surprise on the menu ‚Äî and always a delicious one.
The waiters remember me, the service is warm and personal, and Chef Amitsur, you‚Äôve made my visits to Manhattan unforgettable over the past 8 years.

Thank you for making every meal a truly elevated experience.

I really enjoyed the Mediterranean-inspired menu and the stylish atmosphere at Bourbonia‚Äîthe food was flavorful and beautifully presented.
Unfortunately, the service left a lot to be desired. From the start, it was inattentive and disorganized, and when I politely pointed it out, instead of offering a simple apology, the staff responded with awkward jokes that only made the situation more frustrating.
A sincere acknowledgment would have gone a long way.
Great food can‚Äôt fully make up for poor hospitality, which is disappointing for a place with such potential!
Excellent dinner with a lot of  sophistication and a celerity speed for a wonderful meal. Bartender Eugenie, Argentinian was a highly friendly and really wonderful.

We chose this restaurant based on it being so highly rated (4.7). We visited for a birthday celebration dinner. The hostesses were kind and welcoming. The atmosphere/decor is nice, music a bit too loud. The indoor seating felt very crammed, especially the ones allocated for parties of two. Our waiter (not going to mention the name) came off as not very personable, almost robotic. No intro, no recommendations, suggestions. Almost felt like - what do you want from the menu so I could go put in the order. All the servers though were very kind and attentive. The food was coming out really quick, to the point that it seemed like they want you to finish with your food so they could use the table for the next reservation. As for the food, the presentation was excellent. We had five sampler appetizer and it was amazing. For the main we had the salmon and lamb dishes. The salmon was way overcooked / almost burnt and the lamb wasn't seasoned well / missing flavor. For a $200 bill, we definitely had much higher expectations.
Our server Gonzalo was amazing! We did the bottomless brunch, and he was super attentive to make sure no cup was empty! Very friendly and professional.

I went for brunch. The food's presentation is excellent and the flavors are good, but nothing blew my mind. The prices are high, but the portions are generous. The coffee was pretty average coffee pot fare. The service was good as expected from an upscale establishment. The corner location is gorgeous, with plenty of space between tables and a quite pleasant sidewalk seating.

Always the best service‚Ä¶ Ratko is amazing, fast & efficient! the dirty martinis were amazing! there were 10 of us at the bar celebrating our friends bday and he was as cool as a cucumber. the drinks kept flowing and Ratko didn‚Äôt miss a beat! we love you Ratko & Barbonia! Also, we miss you Mr. Lawrence!

Thank you for everything
xo, Butterfly Studio Salon!
Our bartender was amazing. Great drinks, service and personality! Thanks for making our dinner experience great Peter C.!
Loved the internal ambience. Food volume is good and taste is too good. Greeky style. Chicken entree is fabulous. Would highly recommend this place :)
I had a great time here! The food was amazing, Rigo was a wonderful waiter, the space is charming, and the entire staff was very attentive. I will definitely come back!

Beautiful restaurant, and we had an amazing table. It was later in the evening when we sat down, so that may have played a part in this, but drinks came out super fast as did the food, which was appreciated. The food itself was very tasty, cooked well, with no complaints. Our server Gonzalo C was terrific- great recommendations and very friendly!

Tony from Five and Dime recommend this beautiful restaurant, and I am so glad he did!!! The atmosphere is beautiful and the music fun. The staff is so professional. We were a big group and we felt well cared for. The food is among the best I have ever had. You MUST try the dessert!!! üòã

Nice restaurant with good vibes. Drinks and food were good. Desserts were awesome. I ordered chicken kebab which was good. Hummus and bread were decent. The best was chocolate tasting! Our service was too strict with the timing and it felt as if he was being a mummy to us. Rest was all ok. Good place and nice vibes for a get together with friends.

Overall, it‚Äôs a fantastic spot for brunch, especially if you're gathering with a large group. The service is prompt and attentive, ensuring a smooth dining experience. One thing to keep in mind is that it can get a bit noisy, but that‚Äôs a minor trade-off for the lively atmosphere. The food is both delicious and generously portioned. I‚Äôd definitely return!
The food here is great! Highly recommend the  artichokes. The service was excellent and we loved the friendliness of Eugene!

Had a wonderful lunch here on a warm sunny day. The food here is excellent and I would highly recommend it. The restaurant was busy and suggests it‚Äôs a popular venue with so much choice nearby. Will certainly want to come back on my next visit to New York.
Gonzalo was a great server. He knew everything about the menu and was attentive, professional and patient. I‚Äôd come back just for him!
Today I went to lunch with a friend for the first time here. We sat at the bar, and Eugene made us feel right at home. Excellent service and attention. I'll be back soon. Highly recommended!

My husband and kids took me out to Barbounia for my birthday. It was recommended by our niece and was a huge hit- Gonzalo, our server, was attentive, courteous and made awesome recommendations!
Food was incredibly good- fresh and flavorful. And, I had a heartfelt ensemble singing me happy birthday ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è
We only had a cocktail. But service at the bar was excellent. Our bartender was personable and gracious. Eugenio. Wonderful cocktails!

Very loud, beautiful and vibrant!
Food is delicious, totally worth it!
Service was great, all good no but‚Äôs
